title: Gura amatike ya bisi bitakugoye
subtitle: Mushyiremo imyirondoro yanyu
locationError: Nyamuneka hitamo aho uva n'aho ugera

priorities.title: Urugendo rwawe, iby'ingenzi kuri wowe
priorities.description: Ufite ingengo y'imari ntoya? Ufite gahunda nyinshi? Bika amatike ahuye n'ibyo ukeneye.

coverage.title: Uburyo bwo kugera hose
coverage.description: Zigama igihe ugereranya amahitamo yose y'urugendo rwawe rwa bisi ahantu hamwe.

support.title: Ubufasha amasaha 24/7
support.description: Itsinda ryacu ry'inzobere rihora rihari ngo rigufashe.

whyJoin.title: Impamvu zo kwifatanya na Tike
whyJoin.subtitle: Kugura no kwishyura byoroshye
benefits: Genzura no gusubika ingendo zawe byoroshye
Bika uburyo bwo kwishyura n'amakuru yawe y'ubwishyu
Amakuru yawe arinzwe neza mu ngendo zawe!

bookOnline.title: Bika amatike ya bisi kuri murandasi
bookOnline.description: Buri munsi, abagenzi ibihumbi nkamwe bafata bisi bajya hagati y'imijyi. Hamwe na Tike, ushobora kugereranya bisi byoroshye no kubona amatike ya bisi ahendutse ku rugendo rwawe rukurikira. Niba ushaka kujya i Kampala, Nairobi, Bujumbura cyangwa ahandi muri aka karere, ushobora kureba amasaha ya bisi, ibiciro by'amatike n'ibikorwa bitangwa muri bisi. Hamwe na Tike, bika amatike ya bisi kuri murandasi byoroshye mu makompanyi meza. Reba amasaha, gereranya ibiciro kandi umenye serivisi zitangwa (WiFi, umwanya munini wo kurambura amaguru, uburenganzira bwo gutwara imizigo myinshi).
